subtasks.details: Design tone-specific prompts with examples, implement tone detection to suggest appropriate adjustments, create a preview system for tone changes, develop industry-specific tone recommendations, and implement partial tone adjustments for selected text. Use controlled generation techniques with specific tone examples in prompts.

subtasks.title: Build AI-Generated Professional Summary System
subtasks.description: Create a feature that generates a compelling professional summary based on the user's experience, skills, and career goals.
subtasks.details: Design prompts that extract key career highlights, implement personalization based on target job, create length variations (short, medium, long), develop industry-specific templates as prompt examples, and implement a regeneration option with different styles. Use system messages to control summary style and format.

subtasks.title: Implement Keyword Optimization for ATS
subtasks.description: Develop a system that suggests keyword optimizations to improve resume compatibility with Applicant Tracking Systems.
subtasks.details: Create a database of industry-specific ATS keywords, design prompts that identify missing relevant keywords, implement keyword density analysis, develop job description matching functionality, and create visualization of keyword coverage. Include prompt chaining to first analyze content then generate specific suggestions.

subtasks.title: Create AI Response Caching System
subtasks.description: Implement a caching mechanism to store and reuse AI responses for common queries to reduce API costs and improve performance.
subtasks.details: Design cache key generation based on input parameters, implement TTL-based cache expiration, create cache invalidation triggers for user content changes, develop cache hit/miss analytics, and implement partial matching for similar requests. Include prompt hashing techniques to identify semantically equivalent requests.

subtasks.title: Develop User Feedback Collection for AI Suggestions
subtasks.description: Create a system to collect and analyze user feedback on AI-generated suggestions to improve future recommendations.
subtasks.details: Implement thumbs up/down feedback UI, create detailed feedback forms for rejected suggestions, develop feedback aggregation and analysis dashboard, implement prompt refinement based on feedback patterns, and create A/B testing for different prompt strategies. Include feedback-based prompt optimization pipeline.

subtasks.title: Implement Fallback Mechanisms for AI Features
subtasks.description: Create robust fallback systems for when AI services are unavailable, rate-limited, or producing low-quality results.
subtasks.details: Design template-based fallbacks for common requests, implement quality threshold detection for AI responses, create graceful degradation of features during API issues, develop user communication for service limitations, and implement local processing alternatives where possible. Include prompt quality scoring to detect and reject low-quality generations.

tasks.title: Implement Cover Letter Generator
tasks.description: Create a cover letter generation system that uses resume data to create personalized cover letters with customizable templates and AI-enhanced content suggestions.
tasks.details:
1. Design database schema for cover letters
2. Create cover letter templates matching resume styles
3. Implement data mapping from resume to cover letter fields
4. Add customization options for salutation, opening, body paragraphs, and closing
5. Integrate AI for generating personalized content based on job description
6. Create company and recipient input fields
7. Implement tone adjustment specific to cover letters
8. Add formatting options for date, address blocks, and signature
9. Create preview and editing interface
10. Implement save and version management for multiple cover letters
tasks.testStrategy: Test data mapping accuracy from resume to cover letter. Verify AI-generated content quality with various inputs. Test template rendering across devices. Validate cover letter export formats. Test version management system.

subtasks.title: Design Cover Letter Database Schema
subtasks.description: Create a comprehensive database schema for storing cover letters, templates, and version history.
subtasks.details: Design tables for: cover_letters (id, user_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at, job_id), cover_letter_versions (id, cover_letter_id, content, created_at), cover_letter_templates (id, name, structure, style, category), and cover_letter_sections (id, cover_letter_id, section_type, content). Include relationships between resume data and cover letter entities.

subtasks.title: Develop Cover Letter Templates
subtasks.description: Create multiple cover letter templates matching existing resume styles with consistent branding.
subtasks.details: Develop at least 3 templates per category (modern, traditional, creative) with HTML/CSS structures. Each template should include placeholders for header, recipient info, salutation, opening paragraph, body paragraphs, closing, and signature. Ensure templates are responsive and print-friendly.

subtasks.title: Implement Resume-to-Cover Letter Data Mapping
subtasks.description: Create a system to intelligently map resume data to appropriate cover letter sections.
subtasks.details: Develop mapping logic to transfer contact information, professional summary, skills, and experience highlights from resume to cover letter. Create data transformation functions to format resume content appropriately for cover letter context. Implement validation to ensure all required fields are populated.

subtasks.title: Build Cover Letter Customization Interface
subtasks.description: Create UI components for customizing different sections of the cover letter.
subtasks.details: Develop form components for customizing salutation, opening paragraph, body paragraphs (skills, experience, company fit), and closing. Include rich text editing capabilities, section reordering, and the ability to add/remove paragraphs. Implement real-time preview of changes.

subtasks.title: Integrate AI Content Generation
subtasks.description: Implement AI-powered content suggestions for different cover letter sections based on resume data and job description.
subtasks.details: Integrate with OpenAI or similar API to generate personalized content suggestions. Create prompts that incorporate resume skills, experience, job requirements, and company information. Implement controls for regenerating specific sections and adjusting suggestion parameters. Add caching for API responses to improve performance.

subtasks.title: Develop Company Information Management
subtasks.description: Create a system for managing recipient and company information in cover letters.
subtasks.details: Build form components for inputting company name, recipient name/title, company address, and job title. Implement company information storage in the database. Create auto-fill functionality from previously used companies. Add validation for required fields and format checking for addresses.

subtasks.title: Implement Tone and Style Adjustment
subtasks.description: Create controls for adjusting the tone, formality, and style of cover letter content.
subtasks.details: Develop tone selection interface (formal, conversational, enthusiastic, etc.). Implement style parameters that affect word choice and sentence structure. Create preview functionality to demonstrate tone differences. Integrate tone settings with AI content generation parameters.

subtasks.title: Build Formatting and Layout Options
subtasks.description: Implement controls for adjusting cover letter formatting, layout, and export options.
subtasks.details: Create controls for date format, address block positioning, signature style, and margins. Implement font and spacing adjustments that maintain consistency with selected template. Add page break controls for longer letters. Develop export options for PDF, Word, and plain text formats.

subtasks.title: Implement Version Management System
subtasks.description: Create a system for managing multiple versions of cover letters for different applications.
subtasks.details: Implement version history tracking with timestamps and change summaries. Create UI for viewing, comparing, and restoring previous versions. Develop functionality to clone existing cover letters as starting points for new applications. Add tagging system to organize cover letters by company, role, or status.

tasks.title: Develop Document Export System
tasks.description: Implement functionality to export resumes and cover letters in PDF and DOCX formats with proper formatting preservation and watermarking for free users.
tasks.details:
1. Research and integrate PDF generation library (e.g., puppeteer, jsPDF)
2. Implement DOCX export using docx.js or similar library
3. Create export queue system for handling multiple requests
4. Add watermarking functionality for free tier users
5. Implement download tracking and limiting for free users
6. Create email delivery option for exported documents
7. Add metadata to exported files (title, author, keywords)
8. Implement progress indicators for export process
9. Create error handling for failed exports
10. Add export history tracking in user dashboard
tasks.testStrategy: Test export quality across different templates. Verify formatting consistency between preview and exports. Performance testing for large documents. Test watermarking functionality. Verify download limits work correctly for free users.

subtasks.title: Research and Select PDF Generation Library
subtasks.description: Evaluate and select the most appropriate PDF generation library based on formatting capabilities, performance, and browser compatibility.
subtasks.details: Compare libraries like puppeteer, jsPDF, and PDF-lib. Create test implementations with each library using sample resume templates. Evaluate rendering quality, performance metrics, and browser compatibility. Document findings and make a final selection with justification.

subtasks.title: Implement DOCX Export Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the DOCX export system that preserves all formatting from the resume builder.
subtasks.details: Research and select appropriate DOCX generation library (docx.js, mammoth, etc.). Implement template-to-DOCX conversion ensuring styles, fonts, and layout are preserved. Create utility functions for handling tables, lists, and formatting. Optimize for file size and generation speed.

subtasks.title: Create Export Queue System
subtasks.description: Develop a queue-based system to handle multiple export requests efficiently without overloading server resources.
subtasks.details: Implement a job queue using Redis or similar technology. Create worker processes to handle export jobs asynchronously. Implement priority levels based on user subscription tier. Add monitoring and logging for queue performance. Design retry mechanisms for failed exports.

subtasks.title: Implement Watermarking Functionality
subtasks.description: Create a watermarking system for documents exported by free-tier users.
subtasks.details: Design watermark appearance that is visible but not overly intrusive. Implement watermark insertion for both PDF and DOCX formats. Create configuration options for watermark position, opacity, and text. Ensure watermarks cannot be easily removed by users. Test watermark appearance across different templates.

subtasks.title: Develop Download Tracking and Limiting System
subtasks.description: Create a system to track document downloads and enforce limits for free-tier users.
subtasks.details: Design database schema for tracking user downloads. Implement middleware to check download limits before processing export requests. Create admin dashboard for monitoring download metrics. Implement user notifications when approaching download limits. Add upgrade prompts when limits are reached.

subtasks.title: Implement Email Delivery for Exported Documents
subtasks.description: Create functionality to deliver exported documents via email as an alternative to direct download.
subtasks.details: Set up email delivery service integration (SendGrid, AWS SES, etc.). Create email templates for document delivery. Implement secure document attachment or secure download link generation. Add email delivery tracking and failure handling. Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse.

subtasks.title: Add Metadata and Document Properties
subtasks.description: Implement functionality to add appropriate metadata to exported documents.
subtasks.details: Create system to add title, author, keywords, and other metadata to PDF and DOCX files. Implement custom document properties based on user data and template information. Ensure metadata is properly encoded and complies with format specifications. Add options for users to customize certain metadata fields.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling and Recovery System
subtasks.description: Develop comprehensive error handling for the export system with user-friendly error messages and recovery options.
subtasks.details: Identify and categorize potential failure points in the export process. Implement appropriate error handling for each scenario. Create user-friendly error messages and recovery suggestions. Develop automated retry mechanisms for transient errors. Implement logging and monitoring for export failures. Create admin alerts for critical export system issues.

tasks.title: Implement Subscription and Payment System
tasks.description: Create a subscription system with free trial and premium plans. Integrate Stripe and PayPal for payment processing with proper handling of subscription lifecycle.
tasks.details:
1. Design subscription plans database schema
2. Create subscription plans (free, monthly, yearly)
3. Integrate Stripe payment gateway
4. Add PayPal payment option
5. Implement subscription management dashboard
6. Create upgrade prompts for free users
7. Implement trial period logic with expiration
8. Add payment history and receipts
9. Create subscription cancellation and reactivation flows
10. Implement proper error handling for payment failures
11. Add subscription status webhooks for payment updates
12. Implement prorated upgrades/downgrades
tasks.testStrategy: Test payment flows with Stripe and PayPal test accounts. Verify subscription status updates correctly. Test trial expiration and conversion flows. Validate receipt generation. Test cancellation and reactivation processes. Verify error handling for declined payments.

subtasks.title: Design Database Schema for Subscription System
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive database schema for subscription and payment system including tables for plans, subscriptions, transactions, and payment methods.
subtasks.details: Design tables for: subscription_plans (id, name, price, billing_cycle, features), user_subscriptions (id, user_id, plan_id, status, start_date, end_date, trial_end_date, payment_provider), payment_methods (id, user_id, provider, token, last_four, expiry_date), and transactions (id, user_id, subscription_id, amount, status, provider, transaction_id, created_at). Include proper indexes and foreign key relationships.

subtasks.title: Create Subscription Plans Configuration
subtasks.description: Define and implement subscription plans including free tier, monthly and yearly premium options with appropriate feature flags.
subtasks.details: Create seed data for subscription plans. Implement plan comparison table UI component. Define feature limitations for each plan. Create database migrations and seeders. Implement plan feature flag system to control access to premium features throughout the application.

subtasks.title: Integrate Stripe Payment Gateway
subtasks.description: Implement Stripe API integration for processing subscription payments and managing customer data.
subtasks.details: Set up Stripe SDK. Create Stripe customer records for users. Implement payment intent creation. Design secure card collection form with Stripe Elements. Create webhook endpoints for payment events. Implement subscription creation, updating, and cancellation through Stripe API. Create error handling for declined payments and other Stripe errors.

subtasks.title: Integrate PayPal Payment Gateway
subtasks.description: Implement PayPal API integration as an alternative payment method for subscriptions.
subtasks.details: Set up PayPal SDK. Implement PayPal subscription creation flow. Create PayPal webhook handlers. Design PayPal payment UI components. Implement subscription management through PayPal API. Create unified payment provider interface to abstract provider-specific logic.

subtasks.title: Implement Subscription Management Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create user interface for customers to view and manage their subscription details.
subtasks.details: Design UI for displaying current plan, billing cycle, next payment date, and payment method. Implement plan upgrade/downgrade functionality with appropriate proration. Create payment method management interface. Add subscription status indicators. Implement receipt download functionality.

subtasks.title: Implement Trial Period Logic
subtasks.description: Create system for managing free trial periods including signup, expiration notifications, and conversion to paid plans.
subtasks.details: Implement trial period tracking in database. Create trial expiration notification system (email + in-app). Design trial conversion flow to paid subscription. Implement trial extension functionality for admins. Create trial status indicators throughout the application. Implement graceful degradation of features after trial expiration.

subtasks.title: Create Payment History and Receipt System
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive payment history tracking and receipt generation for users.
subtasks.details: Design payment history UI with filtering and sorting. Implement PDF receipt generation with proper tax information. Create transaction record storage system. Implement receipt email delivery. Design invoice numbering system. Create admin interface for transaction management and refunds.

subtasks.title: Implement Subscription Cancellation and Reactivation Flows
subtasks.description: Create user flows for cancelling subscriptions, handling grace periods, and reactivating cancelled subscriptions.
subtasks.details: Design cancellation UI with feedback collection. Implement immediate vs. end-of-period cancellation options. Create subscription reactivation flow. Implement data retention policy for cancelled accounts. Design win-back email campaign for cancelled users. Create admin tools for managing cancellations.

subtasks.title: Implement Payment Error Handling and Recovery
subtasks.description: Create robust error handling for payment failures with automated recovery attempts and user notifications.
subtasks.details: Implement payment failure detection system. Create dunning management system for retrying failed payments. Design payment update UI for expired/declined cards. Implement notification system for payment failures. Create grace period logic for failed payments. Design error logging and monitoring for payment issues.

subtasks.title: Implement Payment Webhooks and Event Handling
subtasks.description: Create webhook endpoints and event handlers for real-time payment status updates from payment providers.
subtasks.details: Implement webhook authentication and validation. Create event handlers for payment_succeeded, payment_failed, subscription_created, subscription_updated, subscription_cancelled events. Implement idempotency handling for duplicate events. Create webhook logging system. Design webhook failure recovery process. Implement webhook testing tools.

subtasks.title: Implement Proration and Billing Adjustments
subtasks.description: Create system for handling plan changes mid-billing cycle with appropriate proration calculations.
subtasks.details: Implement proration calculation logic for upgrades and downgrades. Create UI for displaying proration credits/charges during plan changes. Implement immediate vs. next-billing-cycle changes. Design billing adjustment system for refunds and credits. Create admin tools for manual billing adjustments.

subtasks.title: Implement Payment Security and Compliance Measures
subtasks.description: Ensure payment system meets security best practices and compliance requirements (PCI, GDPR, etc.).
subtasks.details: Implement PCI compliance measures (no card data storage). Create data retention policies for payment information. Implement encryption for sensitive data. Create audit logging system for payment operations. Design security monitoring for payment activities. Implement fraud detection measures. Create compliance documentation and security flow diagrams.

tasks.title: Create User Dashboard and Multi-version Management
tasks.description: Implement a comprehensive user dashboard for managing multiple resume versions, cover letters, subscription status, and account settings.
tasks.details:
1. Design dashboard layout with responsive considerations
2. Create resume listing with sorting and filtering options
3. Implement resume duplication functionality
4. Add resume version comparison tool
5. Create cover letter management section
6. Implement document organization with tags and categories
7. Add recent activity timeline
8. Create subscription status and management section
9. Implement account settings and profile management
10. Add usage statistics and document metrics
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard functionality across devices. Verify resume duplication preserves all data. Test filtering and sorting options. Validate version comparison tool. Test account settings changes persist correctly. Verify metrics display accurate information.

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard Layout and Information Architecture
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive wireframes and mockups for the dashboard layout with responsive design considerations for all device sizes.
subtasks.details: Design should include navigation structure, sidebar components, main content area, and responsive breakpoints. Create mockups for desktop, tablet, and mobile views. Define grid system and component spacing. Include dark/light mode variations. Document the information architecture showing how different dashboard sections relate to each other.

subtasks.title: Implement Resume Listing and Filtering Component
subtasks.description: Create a component to display all user resumes with sorting, filtering, and search capabilities.
subtasks.details: Design UI for resume cards showing thumbnail, title, last modified date, and tags. Implement filters for date range, tags, and status. Add sorting options by name, date created, and last modified. Create search functionality that filters by resume content and metadata. Include pagination or infinite scroll for users with many documents. Design empty state for new users.

subtasks.title: Develop Resume Duplication and Version Management
subtasks.description: Create functionality to duplicate existing resumes and manage multiple versions of the same resume.
subtasks.details: Implement 'Duplicate' button on resume cards with modal for naming the new version. Design version history UI showing creation date, author, and changes for each version. Create database schema for tracking relationships between original and duplicated resumes. Implement logic to copy all resume data including sections, formatting, and metadata when duplicating.

subtasks.title: Build Resume Version Comparison Tool
subtasks.description: Create a visual comparison tool that highlights differences between two resume versions.
subtasks.details: Design side-by-side comparison view with highlighted differences. Implement diff algorithm to detect changes in content, formatting, and structure. Create UI controls to select which versions to compare. Add options to view differences by section or as a whole document. Include ability to merge changes from one version to another.

subtasks.title: Implement Cover Letter Management Section
subtasks.description: Create a dedicated section for managing cover letters with similar functionality to the resume management component.
subtasks.details: Design cover letter cards showing title, associated resume, target company, and creation date. Implement filtering by associated resume, company, and date. Create UI for linking cover letters to specific resumes. Add quick actions for editing, duplicating, and deleting cover letters. Design empty state with guidance on creating first cover letter.

subtasks.title: Develop Document Organization System
subtasks.description: Create a system for organizing resumes and cover letters using tags, categories, and folders.
subtasks.details: Design UI for creating, editing, and deleting tags and categories. Implement drag-and-drop functionality for organizing documents into folders. Create batch operations for applying tags to multiple documents. Design filter sidebar for quickly accessing documents by tag or category. Implement search functionality across the organization system.

subtasks.title: Create Activity Timeline and Notifications
subtasks.description: Implement a chronological timeline of user activities and a notification system for important events.
subtasks.details: Design activity feed showing document creations, edits, exports, and system notifications. Implement filters for activity types. Create notification preferences UI in settings. Design notification cards with appropriate icons and actions. Implement real-time updates for new activities. Create database schema for storing activity history.

subtasks.title: Build Subscription Management Interface
subtasks.description: Create an interface for users to view and manage their subscription status, payment methods, and billing history.
subtasks.details: Design subscription overview showing current plan, renewal date, and features. Create payment method management UI with add/edit/delete functionality. Implement billing history table with downloadable invoices. Design upgrade/downgrade flow with plan comparison. Create cancellation flow with feedback collection. Implement trial expiration notifications.

subtasks.title: Implement Account Settings and Profile Management
subtasks.description: Create a comprehensive settings section for managing user profile, preferences, and account security.
subtasks.details: Design tabbed interface for different settings categories (Profile, Security, Preferences, etc.). Implement profile editing with avatar upload. Create password change functionality with current password verification. Design email preferences for notifications. Implement data export and account deletion options. Create UI for managing connected social accounts.

subtasks.title: Develop Usage Statistics and Document Metrics
subtasks.description: Create visualizations and metrics displaying user activity, document statistics, and usage patterns.
subtasks.details: Design dashboard widgets showing document counts by type, recent activity summary, and storage usage. Implement charts for activity over time. Create document completion metrics showing percentage of sections completed. Design export history visualization. Implement API endpoints for retrieving analytics data. Create refresh mechanism for updating metrics in real-time.

tasks.title: Implement Analytics, Monitoring and Optimization
tasks.description: Integrate analytics tools, implement performance monitoring, and create A/B testing framework to track KPIs and optimize user experience.
tasks.details:
1. Integrate Google Analytics for user behavior tracking
2. Add Hotjar for heatmaps and session recording
3. Implement custom event tracking for key user actions
4. Create dashboard for monitoring KPIs (completion rate, conversion rate, etc.)
5. Set up error tracking and reporting system
6. Implement A/B testing framework with Optimizely or similar
7. Create performance monitoring for page load times
8. Add user feedback collection mechanisms
9. Implement funnel analysis for conversion optimization
10. Create automated reporting for key metrics
tasks.testStrategy: Verify analytics events fire correctly for key user actions. Test A/B test variations render properly. Validate performance monitoring accuracy. Test error reporting captures relevant information. Verify KPI calculations match expected values.

subtasks.title: Google Analytics Integration
subtasks.description: Set up and configure Google Analytics 4 for tracking user behavior across the application
subtasks.details:
1. Create Google Analytics 4 property
2. Implement tracking code in application
3. Configure user ID tracking for authenticated users
4. Set up cross-domain tracking if needed
5. Configure enhanced e-commerce tracking for premium features
6. Create custom dimensions for user segments (template types, resume completion status)
7. Set up conversion goals for key actions (resume creation, downloads, etc.)
8. Implement data retention policies compliant with privacy regulations

subtasks.title: Heatmap and Session Recording Setup
subtasks.description: Implement Hotjar or similar tool for visual analytics including heatmaps, session recordings, and user feedback collection
subtasks.details:
1. Create Hotjar account and configure site settings
2. Implement tracking code with proper sampling rates
3. Set up heatmaps for key pages (editor, template selection, dashboard)
4. Configure session recordings with PII masking for privacy
5. Create user feedback polls for specific user segments
6. Set up form analysis for resume builder forms
7. Configure conversion funnels for key user journeys
8. Integrate user feedback widget for qualitative insights

subtasks.title: Custom Event Tracking Implementation
subtasks.description: Define and implement custom event tracking for key user actions throughout the application
subtasks.details:
1. Create comprehensive tracking plan document with event taxonomy
2. Define standard event parameters and naming conventions
3. Implement tracking for resume editor interactions (section edits, template changes)
4. Add tracking for template selection and customization events
5. Implement conversion tracking for premium feature usage
6. Set up user journey tracking across application sections
7. Create data validation tests to ensure event consistency
8. Document all custom events for team reference

subtasks.title: KPI Dashboard Creation
subtasks.description: Design and implement a comprehensive dashboard for monitoring key performance indicators
subtasks.details:
1. Define primary KPIs (user acquisition, engagement, conversion rates)
2. Create custom Google Analytics dashboard for executive overview
3. Implement real-time user activity monitoring dashboard
4. Set up conversion funnel visualization
5. Create template popularity and usage metrics dashboard
6. Implement user retention and churn analysis reports
7. Set up automated alerts for KPI threshold violations
8. Create documentation for dashboard interpretation and usage

subtasks.title: Error Tracking and Reporting System
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive error tracking and reporting system to monitor application stability
subtasks.details:
1. Integrate error tracking service (Sentry, Rollbar, etc.)
2. Configure error grouping and prioritization
3. Set up real-time alerts for critical errors
4. Implement context collection for error debugging
5. Create error dashboards for development team
6. Configure performance monitoring for frontend and API endpoints
7. Implement user feedback collection on error pages
8. Create error resolution workflow and documentation

subtasks.title: A/B Testing Framework Implementation
subtasks.description: Set up A/B testing infrastructure to optimize user experience and conversion rates
subtasks.details:
1. Integrate A/B testing platform (Optimizely, Google Optimize, etc.)
2. Create test plan document with hypothesis framework
3. Implement feature flag system for controlled rollouts
4. Set up statistical significance calculators
5. Create A/B test for template selection interface
6. Implement test for resume builder workflow variations
7. Set up conversion tracking specific to A/B test variants
8. Create documentation for A/B test creation and analysis

subtasks.title: Performance Monitoring Implementation
subtasks.description: Set up comprehensive performance monitoring for frontend and backend systems
subtasks.details:
1. Implement Web Vitals tracking for core performance metrics
2. Set up API response time monitoring
3. Create performance budgets for key pages
4. Implement real-user monitoring (RUM) for actual user experience data
5. Set up synthetic monitoring for critical user paths
6. Create performance dashboards with historical trends
7. Implement alerts for performance degradation
8. Document performance optimization recommendations based on collected data

subtasks.title: Automated Reporting System
subtasks.description: Create automated reporting system for regular distribution of analytics insights
subtasks.details:
1. Define key metrics for weekly and monthly reports
2. Set up automated email reports from Google Analytics
3. Create custom report templates for different stakeholders
4. Implement scheduled export of key performance data
5. Create executive dashboard with business KPIs
6. Set up automated anomaly detection and alerting
7. Implement data visualization for trend analysis
8. Create documentation for report interpretation and action items
